<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Courageous Assault](/Feats.aspx?ID=4611) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=546" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Spellshape" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=513" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 105 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[warrior muse](/Muses.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

With a mighty shout, you can stir an ally to attack. If your next action is to cast the [_courageous anthem_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1763) composition cantrip, one ally of your choice who gains a status bonus from the spell can immediately use their reaction to make a melee [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306).

<title level="2">Courageous Assault leads to...</title>
[Courageous Onslaught](/Feats.aspx?ID=4628), [Shared Assault](/Feats.aspx?ID=4621)
name: Courageous Assault
